verses.verse: <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8104>Preserve<s%> me, O <S%H410>God:<s%> for in you do I put my <S%H2620>trust.<s%>
O my soul, you have <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> You are my <S%H136>Lord:<s%> my <S%H2896>goodness<s%> extends not to you;
But to the <S%H6918>saints<s%> that are in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and to the <S%H117>excellent,<s%> in whom is <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2656>delight.<s%>

Their <S%H6094>sorrows<s%> shall be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> that <S%H4116>hasten<s%> after <S%H312>another<s%> god: their <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings of <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I not <S%H5258>offer,<s%> <S%H1077>nor<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> up their <S%H8034>names<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H4490>portion<s%> of my <S%H2506>inheritance<s%> and of my <S%H3563>cup:<s%> you <S%H8551>maintain<s%> my <S%H1486>lot.<s%>
The <S%H2256>lines<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> to me in <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> places; <S%H637>yes,<s%> I <S%H5921>have<s%> a <S%H8231>goodly<s%> <S%H5159>heritage.<s%>
I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has given me <S%H3289>counsel:<s%> my <S%H3629>reins<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H3256>instruct<s%> me in the <S%H3915>night<s%> seasons.
I have <S%H7737>set<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me: <S%H3588>because<s%> he is at my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> I shall not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H8056>glad,<s%> and my <S%H3519>glory<s%> <S%H1523>rejoices:<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> shall <S%H7931>rest<s%> in <S%H983>hope.<s%>

For you will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H7585>hell;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will you <S%H5414>suffer<s%> your <S%H2623>Holy<s%> One to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7845>corruption.<s%>

You will <S%H3045>show<s%> me the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H2416>life:<s%> in your <S%H6440>presence<s%> is <S%H7648>fullness<s%> of <S%H8057>joy;<s%> at your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> there are <S%H5273>pleasures<s%> for ever <S%H5331>more.<s%>
